name: Dead River Prelude (Demo)
description:
Witches can live for over 1000 years. During that time witches can experience intense traumas, multiple heartbreaks, and more. Dead River (TBA) takes place in modern day, but this game is a prequel, set in the past to show the earlier days of Elana, Tanya, and Abraham, all main characters in the final game.

This is a demo/prototype of a prequel story for a survival horror game I've been working on for quite some time now.

I was very VERY inspired by the style of PC-98 games and wanted to go for an older PC aesthetic.
